divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister was outside talking to her friend when i heard her saying ���Oh S**t��� so a ran outside and she started telling me frantically ���These two black helicopters almost collided���. So my first instinct was to run in the middle of the street and look towards the bay cause that���s where the helicopters where heading towards. Then I said their back and we witnessed Fireball UFOś. These lights seemed to disappear and reappear, But luckily the sky was dark and cloudless so you can still see the little white dots in the sky. I was beautiful yet scary in the same way. After about 45 min the whole incident was over but the helicopters were hovering over the bay as if searching for something. This concluded this morning about 7am.
